title: Into My Veins
alt: "Okay, for the last time, the shot is free, so we can't--" "Shut up and take my money!"
transcript:
Cueball: Yesssss
Cueball: Inject this directly into my veins[Beat panel.  Ponytail looks down at a clipboard.][Zoom out to reveal that Cueball is standing by a stool, with Ponytail in front of him with a clipboard and syringe and Hairy behind him with a box of bandages and a first-aid kit.]Ponytail: Ok, but the vaccine is intramuscular...
Hairy: Why do people keep saying that?
Cueball: Sorry, sorry.
Cueball: Just excited.
